title: [GAMEPLAY] Detailed list of current Kled bugs

embed.description: Check out the Kled Tips & Tricks community on Discord - hang out with 217 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.

body: There's a detailed list of Kled bugs located in the discord server under the kled-bugs channel, the majority of which have been there since the character's release. There are around 15 bugs listed with instructions about reproducing each bug.

replies.body: Actually that list I made came from my original list posted here: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/oAvUvnLd-gameplay-kled-has-10-bugs-and-counting-all-listed-with-recreation-some-methods
